name: BAGAR ONLINE
description:
BAGAR ONLINE is a prototype for a top-down fighting game that uses mouse and keyboard.

If you don't play on the same network as your opponent, you'll need to have at least one open port to host a server and get them to join it.

BAGAR uses ZQSD for movement. In order to work nice on a qwerty keyboard you should be able to swap it to azerty pretty easily ( on windows 10 you can press shift + alt to do this ).

There is 3 characters in BAGAR : Blue, Red, and Green. They all have specific movement stats and capacities.

In order to win you have to drop down your opponent's life from 100 to zero.

More details in the readme.txt !
